com.vmware.vapi.protocol.common.json

Class JsonConverter

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vmware.vapi.protocol.common.json.JsonConverter

  • public class JsonConverter
extends java.lang.Object
    Converter which encodes DataValue to and from simple JSON representation.

    This is the JSON representation which is used in REST rendering of the APIs.

      JsonConverter()

      • toDataValue

        public DataValue toDataValue(java.lang.String json)
        This method converts a JSON string representation into a concrete DataValue object.
        Parameters:
        json - a String representation of a JSON
        Returns:
        Returns the concrete DataValue
        Throws:
        CoreException - if the provided InputStream cannot be deserialized

      • toDataValue

        public DataValue toDataValue(java.io.InputStream input)
        This method converts a JSON passed as an InputStream into a concrete DataValue object.
        Parameters:
        input - the InputStream we read the JSON from, which will be closed before the method returns or throws a CoreException
        Returns:
        Returns the concrete DataValue
        Throws:
        CoreException - if the provided InputStream cannot be deserialized

      • fromDataValue

        public java.lang.String fromDataValue(DataValue value)
        This method converts the DataValue object to a JSON string.
        Parameters:
        value - a DataValue object we want to convert to JSON
        Returns:
        the JSON string representation of a DataValue
        Throws:
        CoreException - if the provided DataValue cannot be serialized

      • fromDataValue

        public void fromDataValue(DataValue value,
                          java.io.OutputStream outputStream)
        This method converts the DataValue Object to a ByteArrayOutputStream.
        Parameters:
        value - a DataValue
        outputStream - stream to write the serialized result to, which will be closed before the method returns or throws a CoreException
        Throws:
        CoreException - if the provided DataValue cannot be serialized
